p: Crapiste and Rotstein [ 9] proposed a starchy-component model to predict isotherms from components. They suggested that their model could be applied over the entire range of moisture content. However, the results of this study indicated that this component model was valid in the a w range below 0.7. The failure is the higher a w range of this component model might be due to the interaction of these components is the higher a w range.
